column.name: report_sql
column.value: select o.name as Office , c.external_id as UID, concat(c.firstname,' ',c.lastname) as 'Customer Name', l.account_no as 'Loan Id Number', l.principal_amount as 'Loan Amount', cvs.code_value as 'Strata', cvc.code_value as 'Type of Collateral', lc.value as 'Collateral Coverage', '' as 'OMV', '' as 'FSV', '' as 'Province', '' as 'District', '' as 'Sector', '' as 'Cell', '' as 'Village' from m_office o join m_office ounder on ounder.hierarchy like concat(o.hierarchy, '%') and ounder.hierarchy like concat('${currentUserHierarchy}', '%') join m_client c on c.office_id = ounder.id join m_loan l on l.client_id = c.id left join m_client_other_info coi on coi.client_id = c.id left join m_code_value cvs on cvs.id = coi.strata_cv_id left join m_loan_collateral lc on lc.loan_id = l.id left join m_code_value cvc on cvc.id = lc.type_cv_id where o.id = ${officeId}

column.name: report_id
column.valueComputed: (select sr.id from stretchy_report sr where sr.report_name ='Collateral')

column.name: parameter_id
column.valueComputed: (select sp.id from stretchy_parameter sp where sp.parameter_name = 'OfficeIdSelectOne')
